posts.post_content:
Long time lurker, and finally getting an itch to buy some vintage baseball. Im looking for any Ed Abbaticchio cards (Even as far back as 1902) I can get on here. Looking for any graded SGC or PSA cards only. Unfortunately I do not pay paypal gift, so please take that into consideration when setting a price. Im as legit as they come, easy to deal with, and hope to find some good peeps on here as I expect to be active from now on. This is long overdue, but im very excited to get going on a nice vintage collection! [url]salsgoods@live.ca[/url] is my email, so shoot me an email, or send me a message on here. (Whatever you prefer). I prefer to pay less than ebay, and I prefer to have all cards shipped to my COMC US address to save us both on time and money. Thanks alot!


Sal
Bump still looking and PP on the ready.
Let's bring this back from the dead.
